name: (LD37) The Crystals of Gingledoof
description:
YOU MUST COLLECT THE CRYYYYYSTALS OF GINGLEDOOOOOF!!!!!!

A turn-based beat-em-up (you heard that right) about the legendary dwarf Popo Momo.

Instructions and lore are included with the game.

The Post-Compo version with improved visuals and controls can be found on my website.
